name: Doorway to Dreams
description: 'Doorway to Dreams' invites viewers into a scene filled with wonder and possibility. The painting portrays a woman standing in an open doorway, gazing out into a vibrant meadow and the distant horizon. The interplay of light, color, and texture symbolizes transition and the journey into the unknown. Created by Bibi in 2024, this artwork celebrates the beauty of new beginnings and the courage to step into the future.
